Sentencas: Fluorite-like compounds of the Sm5Mo3O16 composition and, for the first time, their fluorine-and lithium-containing analogues of the LiSm4Mo3O15F composition have been obtained by solid-phase synthesis in vac-uum sealed quartz ampoules.
Titulo: The fluorite-like LiSm4Mo3O15F ceramics: Synthesis and conductivity

Sentencas: The resulting materials were characterized by XRD, differential scanning calo-rimetry, thermogravimetry, scanning electron microscopy, and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: The fluorite-like LiSm4Mo3O15F ceramics: Synthesis and conductivity

Sentencas: It was found that LiSm4Mo3O15F samples are isostructural to cubic Sm5Mo3O16 compounds with a fluorite-like structure.
Titulo: The fluorite-like LiSm4Mo3O15F ceramics: Synthesis and conductivity

Sentencas: It is shown that the double replacement of samarium with lithium and oxygen with fluorine leads to the appearance of a reversible phase transition accompanied by a jump in conductivity by 2 orders of magnitude.
Titulo: The fluorite-like LiSm4Mo3O15F ceramics: Synthesis and conductivity

Sentencas: The con-ductivity of the LiSm4Mo3O15F compound reaches the value of 10-3 S/cm at 600 degrees C which is about half an order of magnitude higher than the conductivity of non-fluorinated compounds at this temperature.
Titulo: The fluorite-like LiSm4Mo3O15F ceramics: Synthesis and conductivity
